body.p: For factors similar to those considered by the IASB, the FASB issued an Accounting Standards Update 2015‑14 Revenue from Contracts with Customers (Topic 606): Deferral of the Effective Date in August 2015 also deferring the effective date of Topic 606 for all entities by one year. Consequently, a public entity would be required to apply Topic 606 to annual reporting periods beginning after 15 December 2017. The FASB decided to permit early application of Topic 606 by all entities, but not before the original effective date of Topic 606 for a public entity (ie annual reporting periods beginning after 15 December 2016).
